    This cipher went unsolved from September 6, 2016 until February 17, 2026, spanning 3,451 days.

    Congratulations to <Username name="randomiser" type="discord"/> for solving this cipher!
    This is the longest time taken to solve a cipher in the history of the series (beating GK 12 by just 9 days), and it is a
    testament to the difficulty of this cipher.
</Info>

## Ciphertext

## Solution

- *Credit to <Username name="randomiser" type="discord"/> for solving this cipher!*

### Important notes

<RevelationsSnippet />

### Steps

Step 1: Convert hexadecimal to base64.

Step 2: XTEA (CFB) decrypt with key "Zombies" and hexadecimal IV `30303030303030303030303030303030`.

Step 3: Reverse

Step 4: ROT-6

## Plaintext

> Now that the many worlds are one, it has all reset. There are no Apothicon, Keepers, or 115 knocking around to cause trouble.  Now I can focus on the children, making sure they grow up in a better place. â€“M
